name: Pogo Prowl
description:
Welcome to a world filled with supernatural creatures. You belong to a pack of werewolves who travel through thick and foggy forests with their loyal and reliable pogo sticks.

During a full moon, you notice a change in behavior in your fellow crew members. They suddenly start attacking you without notice. It's time to defend yourself!

The goal is to jump on your enemies, but be careful not to let them jump on you. Try to achieve a high score!

|---------------------------------|

Controls:
WASD - Move
Spacebar - Jump higher

|---------------------------------|

First Game, first Game Jam, but certainly not the last.
I know that the game is flawed and I underestimated the time you need, but I'm happy for every kind of feedback you give me. 
This experience was worth a lot more than I initially thought it would be.
Thank you.
